name: Puzzle Game (itch) (Spartan Game Labs)
description:
Descriptions: The goal is to get a red ball to the end of a level. The story is that the player is a super-intelligent AI that is being trained to solve various puzzles.

Instructions: click and drag the small blue peg to play the game. The goal is to get the red ball to the yellow square at the end of the level. You have to place the peg in the right place to complete the level. There is also the extra challenge of trying to get the ball to the end in the fastest time possible.
